headline: GlobalData gets takeover proposals from funds managed by ICG, KKR
summary: Britain's GlobalData said on Wednesday it had received preliminary takeover proposals from funds managed by private equity groups ICG and KKR, sending its shares up as much as 35.9%. ...

headline: Wood Sees Private Markets Meltdown If There's a US Slump
summary: If there is a real US downturn, what blows up in America is private equity, private credit, according to Jefferies' global head of equity strategy Christopher Wood. He made the comments in an...

headline: Apollo Global: Extraordinary Performance With Alternative Assets
summary: Apollo Global Management, Inc. thrives on strategic growth & acquisitions. With Q1 earnings approaching, we take a look at APO and compare it to peers.
